links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

links.title: Former Pepsi Building Now Home To Apple Electric Car Project - Report
links.description: News has broken today that Apple has leased a 96,000 sq. ft. facility nearby its already functioning "noisy" automotive research facility in Sunnyvale, California. The property is located at 960 Kifer road, 10 minutes from Cupertino. Apple leased an entire seven building campus in Sunnyvale, less than a mile from here.
